articles.title: Spanish ‘soonicorn’ Multiverse Computing releases free compressed AI model
articles.description: Spanish startup Multiverse Computing has released a new version of its HyperNova 60B model on Hugging Face that, it says, bests Mistral's model.
articles.author: Anna Heim

articles.title: Apple rolls out age-verification tools worldwide to comply with growing web of child safety laws
articles.description: Apple complies with new age-assurance laws in the U.S. and abroad, including those that block users from downloading apps aimed at adults.
articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: Uber engineers built an AI version of their boss
articles.description: Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi said the company’s employees have gone all in on AI, going so far as to build a chatbot of him that they use to practice
articles.author: Kirsten Korosec

articles.title: Stripe is reportedly eyeing deal to buy some or all of PayPal
articles.description: Stripe might be looking to buy PayPal, or parts of it, per early reports.
articles.author: Dominic-Madori Davis

articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai

articles.title: Google’s new 1.9GW clean energy deal includes massive 100-hour battery
articles.description: Form Energy's iron-air batteries will store wind and solar power to keep the data center running 24/7.
articles.author: Tim De Chant

articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Discord delays global rollout of age verification after backlash
articles.description: The company added that 90% of users won’t need to verify their age and will be able to keep using Discord as usual.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.author: Sarah Perez

articles.title: More startups are hitting $10M ARR in 3 months than ever before
articles.description: AI has brought the startup world the rise of companies that instantly hit multimillion-dollar ARR. Stripe revealed some data that shows how common
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: Instagram’s TV app is launching on Google TV devices
articles.description: By bringing Reels to TV, Instagram is looking to better compete with YouTube, which largely dominates the TV space.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.description: The company said that a new agent being introduced in Opal will allow users to create mini-apps that can let them plan and execute tasks using text

articles.title: Spotify and Liquid Death release a limited-edition speaker shaped like … an urn?
articles.description: Spotify and Liquid Death launched what might be the wildest product of the year: a speaker shaped like a urn.

articles.title: Twitch is overhauling its suspensions policy
articles.description: The company is implementing two suspension types: streaming suspensions and chatting suspensions.

articles.title: Stripe, PayPal Ventures bet on India’s Xflow to fix cross-border B2B payments
articles.description: Stripe and PayPal Ventures have participated in Xflow's $16.6 million round that gives it a post-money valuation of $85 million.

articles.title: Tesla’s battle with the California Department of Motor Vehicles isn’t over after all
articles.description: Tesla has filed a lawsuit against the California DMV in the ongoing battle around Autopilot.
